short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CanInvite - The Must-Have Recruiting Tool for LinkedIn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CanInvite is an indispensable Chrome extension for recruiters who are looking to streamline their LinkedIn recruitment process. With CanInvite, recruiters can now invite potential candidates directly to the recruitment automation platform with just one click!
Gone are the days when recruiters had to manually export candidate data from LinkedIn and then upload it onto their recruitment platform. With CanInvite, recruiters can save time and effort by sending out invitations to the platform directly from the candidate's LinkedIn profile.
How it Works

It's simple! Once the recruiter logs into the recruitment platform, they can activate the CanInvite extension on their Chrome browser. From there, they can navigate to the LinkedIn profile of a potential candidate, and click on the CanInvite button located next to their name. The candidate will then receive an invitation to the recruitment platform, which they can accept or decline at their discretion.

Download the CanInvite Chrome Extension for Free
